summary: This document is a Trading Authorization Agreement from TD Ameritrade, outlining the terms under which an Authorized Agent can trade on behalf of the Account Owner(s). It details the responsibilities and limitations of the Authorized Agent, as well as the rights of the Brokerage Firm and Clearing Firm. The document emphasizes the need for identification and compliance with regulations to prevent money laundering and terrorism funding.
keyFacts: The document is a Trading Authorization Agreement for TD Ameritrade.
It allows an Authorized Agent to trade on behalf of the Account Owner(s).
The Authorized Agent cannot make changes to the Account Owner(s) account without permission.
The document includes provisions for indemnity and responsibilities of the Brokerage Firm.
There are sections indicating the need for identification to prevent money laundering.
